arabic: أَوْ يَطْلُعَ الْفَجْرُ مِنْ لَيْلَتِيْ هٰذِهِ
وَلَكَ قِبَلِيْ تَبِعَةٌ أَوْ ذَنْبٌ تُعَذِّبُنِيْ عَلَيْهِ
translation: I seek refuge with the majesty of Your Honorable Face,
Against that the month of Ramadan elapses
And there is still a sin or an offense in my record for which You may chastise me.
transliteration: aw yaṭlu`al fajru min laylatī hādhih
walaka qibalī tabi`atun aw dhanbun tu`adhhibunī `alayh
